13DeckLink::DisplayMode::DisplayMode(IDeckLinkDisplayMode *mode) {
14 assert(mode);
15
16 _width = mode->GetWidth();
17 _height = mode->GetHeight();
18 _raw_mode = mode->GetDisplayMode();
19
20 _flags = BitMask<DisplayModeFlags>(mode->GetFlags());
21
22 _field_dominance = static_cast<FieldDominance>(mode->GetFieldDominance());
23
24 // The framerate is stored in a weird format.
25 BMDTimeValue time_value;
26 BMDTimeScale time_scale;
27 if (const HRESULT result = mode->GetFrameRate(&time_value, &time_scale) != S_OK) {
28 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
29 << errmsg("Unkown failure when calling GetFrameRate on IDeckLinkDisplayMode")
30 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
31 );
32 }
33 _framerate = static_cast<double>(time_scale) / static_cast<double>(time_value);
34
35 char *buf= nullptr;
36 if (const HRESULT result = mode->GetName(const_cast<const char**>(&buf)) != S_OK) {
37 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
38 << errmsg("Unkown failure when calling GetName on IDeckLinkDisplayMode")
39 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
40 );
41 }
42 assert(buf);
43 _name = std::string(buf);
44 free(buf);
45
46 _valid = true;
47}
